verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> we <S%G2065>beseech<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G5228>by<s%> the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> by <S%G2257>our<s%> gathering <S%G1997>together<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, unto him: or, around him

<S%G1818>Let<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1818>deceive<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G3367>any<s%> <S%G5158>means<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> that day shall not come, <S%G3362>except<s%> there <S%G2064>come<s%> a falling <S%G646>away<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> that <S%G444>man<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> be <S%G601>revealed<s%>, the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G684>perdition<s%>;

<S%G3588>Who<s%> <S%G480>opposeth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5229>exalteth<s%> himself <S%G1909>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> that is <S%G4574>worshipped<s%>; <S%G5620>so<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2523>sitteth<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G584>shewing<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%> what <S%G2722>withholdeth<s%> <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> might be <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%>. withholdeth: or, holdeth

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G458>iniquity<s%> <S%G1754>doth<s%> <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G1754>work<s%>: <S%G3440>only<s%> he who <S%G737>now<s%> <S%G2722>letteth<s%> will let, <S%G2193>until<s%> he be <S%G1096>taken<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3319>way<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G601>shall<s%> that <S%G459>Wicked<s%> be <S%G601>revealed<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> shall <S%G355>consume<s%> with the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G2673>destroy<s%> with the <S%G2015>brightness<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3952>coming<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G539>deceivableness<s%> of <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> them that <S%G622>perish<s%>; <S%G473>because<s%> <S%G3739><s%> they <S%G1209>received<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%>, <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> might be <S%G4982>saved<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> are <S%G3784>bound<s%> to give <S%G2168>thanks<s%> <S%G3842>alway<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G25>beloved<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G138>hath<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%> <S%G138>chosen<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> <S%G38>sanctification<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4102>belief<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%>:
